dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 상황에서 얼마나 힘들었을지 이해해. 정말 안타깝다.
dialogue.utter: I understand how hard that must have been for you. It's really unfortunate.

dialogue.ko_utter: 결국 합의금으로 해결했지만, 제대로 싸우지 못한 게 마음에 걸려. 더 잘해주지 못한 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: In the end, we settled it with money, but I regret not fighting harder. I feel like I didn't do enough.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그때의 선택이 아들을 위한 최선이었다고 생각해. 앞으로 더 잘해주면 돼.
dialogue.utter: I believe that was the best choice you could make for your son at the time. You can always do better moving forward.

ko_situation: 어릴 적 꿈을 이루지 못한 게 한이 돼요. 지금 생각해도 아쉬워요.
situation: I regret not achieving my childhood dream. Even now, I still feel sad about it.

dialogue.ko_utter: 어떤 꿈이었나요?
dialogue.utter: What was your dream?

dialogue.ko_utter: 저는 뮤지션이 되는 게 꿈이었어요. 하지만 현실은 그렇지 않았어요.
dialogue.utter: I dreamed of becoming a musician, but reality didn't work out that way.

dialogue.ko_utter: 꿈을 이루지 못한 게 정말 아쉬운 일이에요.
dialogue.utter: It's really sad that you couldn't achieve your dream.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아요. 그때 그 길을 선택하지 못한 게 한이 됐어요.
dialogue.utter: Yes, not choosing that path back then has become a regret for me.

ko_situation: 할머니를 오랜만에 봐서 참 정겨웠어.
situation: It was really heartwarming to see my grandmother after a long time.

dialogue.ko_utter: 얼마 전 오랜만에 할머니 댁에 다녀왔는데, 예전 그대로 계셔서 참 반가웠어.
dialogue.utter: I recently visited my grandmother's house after a long time, and it was so nice to see her just as she was before.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그랬구나. 할머니는 항상 그 자리에 계셔서 마음이 따뜻해지지.
dialogue.utter: That's great to hear. Just knowing that she's always there warms your heart, doesn't it?

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 어릴 때 할머니랑 같이 밭에서 일하던 기억도 나고, 정말 소중한 시간들이었어.
dialogue.utter: Yes, I remember working in the fields with her when I was a kid. Those were really precious times.

dialogue.ko_utter: 할머니가 해주신 음식도 여전히 맛있었어?
dialogue.utter: Was the food she made still as delicious as you remember?

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 그 손맛은 정말 변하지 않더라. 할머니의 정성이 담긴 음식이라 그런지 더 맛있게 느껴졌어.
dialogue.utter: Yes, her cooking hasn't changed at all. It tasted even better because of the love she puts into it.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 시간들이 참 귀중한 것 같아. 할머니와의 추억을 더 많이 쌓아가면 좋겠다.
dialogue.utter: Those moments are really precious. I hope you can make even more memories with her.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그래서 앞으로는 더 자주 찾아뵈려고 해. 할머니가 많이 기뻐하시더라고.
dialogue.utter: That's why I'm planning to visit her more often. She was really happy to see me.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응원할게. 할머니와 함께하는 시간이 너에게도 큰 힘이 될 거야.
dialogue.utter: I'm cheering you on. The time you spend with her will be a great source of strength for you too.

ko_situation: 우리 회사 부장님 있잖아, 처음엔 진짜 엄청 까칠하셔서 너무 싫었는데, 이제는 미운 정이 들었나 봐.
situation: You know my manager at work? At first, I really didn't like him because he was so harsh, but now it seems like I've grown fond of him despite that.

dialogue.ko_utter: 우리 회사 부장님 있잖아, 처음엔 진짜 엄청 까칠하셔서 너무 싫었는데, 이제는 미운 정이 들었나 봐.
dialogue.utter: You know my manager at work? At first, I really didn't like him because he was so harsh, but now it seems like I've grown fond of him despite that.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아, 나도 처음엔 부장님 때문에 힘들었는데, 이제는 그 특유의 엄격함이 이해가 되더라고.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, I had a hard time with him at first too, but now I understand his strictness.

dialogue.ko_utter: 특히 프로젝트 끝나고 나서 다 같이 회식할 때 보면 진짜 마음이 따뜻한 분이시더라.
dialogue.utter: Especially after we finish a project and have a team dinner, you can really see how kind-hearted he is.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 그렇지. 오래 함께하다 보니까 정이 들 수밖에 없는 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, exactly. Spending so much time together, it's hard not to grow attached.

ko_situation: 요즘 임시 보호하던 강아지 입양 보냈는데, 정말 많이 보고 싶어.
situation: I recently sent the dog I was fostering to its new home, and I miss it so much.

dialogue.ko_utter: 요즘 임시 보호하던 강아지 입양 보냈는데, 정말 많이 보고 싶어.
dialogue.utter: I recently sent the dog I was fostering to its new home, and I miss it so much.

dialogue.ko_utter: 처음엔 그냥 잠시 맡아주는 거라 생각했는데, 정이 많이 들었나 봐.
dialogue.utter: At first, I thought it was just temporary care, but I guess you grew really attached.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 매일 같이 산책하고 밥 주면서 정이 많이 들었어. 처음엔 말도 안 듣고 사고만 쳤는데, 이제는 그리워.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, taking it for walks every day and feeding it made me really attached. At first, it didn't listen and caused trouble, but now I really miss it.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아, 그렇게 시간이 지나면서 미운 정 고운 정 다 들게 되지. 다음에 또 기회되면 임시 보호 해볼 생각 있어?
dialogue.utter: That's right, over time you end up with all kinds of feelings. Would you foster again if you had the chance?

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 그래도 이번엔 더 마음 단단히 먹고 해야지. 그래도 그 강아지가 좋은 집으로 갔으니까 다행이야.
dialogue.utter: Yes, but next time I'll be more prepared emotionally. Still, I'm glad that the dog found a good home.

ko_situation: 옛날에 자주 가던 분식집에 갔는데 아직도 사장님이 계셔. 그 떡볶이 맛은 변함없더라.
situation: I went to a snack bar I used to frequent, and the owner is still there. The tteokbokki tastes just as good as ever.

dialogue.ko_utter: 옛날에 자주 가던 분식집에 갔는데 아직도 사장님이 계셔. 그 떡볶이 맛은 변함없더라.
dialogue.utter: I went to a snack bar I used to frequent, and the owner is still there. The tteokbokki tastes just as good as ever.

dialogue.ko_utter: 와, 그 분식집 아직도 있구나. 우리 그 떡볶이 진짜 좋아했잖아. 사장님도 잘 계셔?
dialogue.utter: Wow, that place is still around? We used to love their tteokbokki. Is the owner doing well?

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 사장님도 우리 기억하시더라. 예전처럼 인심도 좋으셔서 서비스도 주셨어.
dialogue.utter: Yes, the owner even remembered us. They were just as generous as before, giving us some free extras.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 가게는 진짜 정이 많이 들지. 우리 다음에 같이 가자. 옛날 생각도 나고 좋을 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: Places like that really hold a special place in your heart. Let's go together next time. It'll be nice to reminisce.
